title: Lovable Package - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Clingy Lover   Cultivation   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Demon Lord   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   First-time Interc**rse   Fox Spirits   Handsome Male Lead   Hunters   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Multiple Realms   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Vampires   Weak Protagonist   World Hopping
author: 秋十杀
description:
Su Tang is a delicate package, incapable of anything, only able to act like a spoiled child.

However, he transmigrated to become a huge villain, having to insult the hegemonic male protagonist, oppress the female protagonist, and then ultimately die an ugly death.

As an ideal villain, Su Tang trembled, resolving to….. act like a spoiled child!

One, act spoiled and the male protagonist will immediately become soft. Act spoiled once more, and will just listen to whatever he says.

Su Tang: QAQ>
